purpose.p: The Condition application module supports the requirements to provide structured information objects that encapsulate parametric values used as criteria to determine the applicability of the information in focus.

inscope.li: Condition as an identifiable information object;
Condition that can be identified, versioned, dated and approved;
Condition as an information object to be referenced by or included in other information objects;
Condition specification defined by parametric criteria;
A single criterion or compound criteria;
Criterion specified by a textual description or a string attribute value;
Criterion specified by numeric value with unit of measure as a fixed or limiting value;
Criterion specified as a membership of a class;
Criterion specified by a relation to a date, date and time or time period;
Criterion specified by a relation to a planned or unexpected event;
